alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:49PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EASTERN CLINTON COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Zula, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Cartwright, Nora, Bug, Cannons Mill, Savage, Alpha, Narvel and Rolan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
